//: TOWER ROSTER REBALANCE: Overhauled base stats to align towers with their intended roles (early-game vs. late-game) and create more distinct strategic choices.

turret.//: ROLE: Early-game workhorse. Increased base damage to make it a reliable starting tower.
turret.name: Basic Turret

freezer.//: ROLE: Early-game utility. Cost reduced to make it an accessible support option from the very beginning.
freezer.name: Freezer

cannon.//: ROLE: Early-game AoE powerhouse. Damage increased to make it effective against early swarms, with piercing shifted to its upgrades.
cannon.name: Cannon Tower

energy_beacon.//: ROLE: Late-game debuff specialist. Innate slow drastically reduced to prevent it from outclassing the Freezer early on. Its power now comes almost exclusively from upgrades.
energy_beacon.name: Energy Beacon

mortar.//: ROLE: Ultimate late-game artillery. Fire rate reduced and range increased to solidify its role as a strategic, long-range weapon that is weak to fast, early enemies.
mortar.name: Mortar
